outputs.output_descr: This project will assist Ministry of Trade and Industry to undertake analysis of the current environment in which industry operates, and work with Ministry of Trade and Industry and industry stakeholders to address the challenges posed by climate change and take advantage of the potential opportunities this offers. The project has three components: Evidence of sustainable industrial production (Component 1), Government capacity building and policy development (Component 2), and Improving the sustainability of industrial enterprises (Component 3).

project_descr: The project is to encourage industry to invest in low carbon technologies and more resource efficient practices through policy and regulatory measures and by directly supporting market participants and energy service providers.
project_title: Strengthening Capacity in Climate Change in Industry
